TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DelegatingXmlDictionaryWriter extends System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter

Docs.summary: A class that wraps a specified writer and delegates all <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> calls to the wrapped writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The writer that is wrapped can be accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.DelegatingXmlDictionaryWriter.InnerWriter%2A> property. Call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.DelegatingXmlDictionaryWriter.InitializeInnerWriter%2A> method to set the wrapped writer and initialize the property. You can call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.DelegatingXmlDictionaryWriter.InitializeTracingWriter%2A> method to set an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> to which non-canonical XML will be echoed.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanCanonicalize { get; }
.property instance bool CanCanonicalize

Docs.summary: Returns a value indicating if the reader is capable of Canonicalization.
Docs.value: true if the reader is capable of Canonicalization; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Close ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

Docs.summary: Closes the underlying stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void EndCanonicalization ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void EndCanonicalization() cil managed

Docs.summary: Stops the canonicalization started by the matching <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter.StartCanonicalization%2A> call.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Flush ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

Docs.summary: Flushes the underlying stream.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void InitializeInnerWriter (System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter innerWriter);
.method familyhidebysig instance void InitializeInnerWriter(class System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter innerWriter) cil managed

Docs.param: The writer that is to be wrapped by this instance.
Docs.summary: Initializes this instance with the specified inner writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.DelegatingXmlDictionaryWriter.InnerWriter%2A> property to the writer specified by the `innerWriter` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void InitializeTracingWriter (System.Xml.XmlWriter tracingWriter);
.method familyhidebysig instance void InitializeTracingWriter(class System.Xml.XmlWriter tracingWriter) cil managed

Docs.param: A writer to which all calls will be echoed. If , calls are not echoed.
Docs.summary: Initializes this instance with a writer to which all calls will be echoed and that will write non-canonical XML.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string LookupPrefix (string ns);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string LookupPrefix(string ns) cil managed

Docs.param: The namespace URI whose prefix you want to find.
Docs.summary: Returns the closest prefix defined in the current namespace scope for the namespace URI.
Docs.returns: The matching prefix or null if no matching namespace URI is found in the current scope.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void StartCanonicalization (System.IO.Stream stream, bool includeComments, string[] inclusivePrefixes);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void StartCanonicalization(class System.IO.Stream stream, bool includeComments, string[] inclusivePrefixes) cil managed

Docs.param: Stream to which the canonical stream should be written.
The value indicates if comments written should be canonicalized as well.
Set of prefixes that needs to be included into the canonical stream. The prefixes are defined at the first element that is written to the canonical stream.
Docs.summary: Indicates the start of canonicalization. Any write operation following this will canonicalize the data and will write it to the given stream.

Docs.param: Byte array to encode.
The position in the buffer indicating the start of the bytes to write.
The number of bytes to write.
Docs.summary: Encodes the specified binary bytes as Base64 and writes out the resulting text.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void WriteDocType (string name, string pubid, string sysid, string subset);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteDocType(string name, string pubid, string sysid, string subset) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the DOCTYPE. This must be non-empty.
If non-null it also writes PUBLIC "pubid" "sysid" where pubid and sysid are replaced with the value of the given arguments.
If pubid is null and sysid is non-null it writes SYSTEM "sysid" where sysid is replaced with the value of this argument.
If non-null it writes [subset] where subset is replaced with the value of this argument.
Docs.summary: Writes the DOCTYPE declaration with the specified name and optional attributes.
